title: As Muradellas Mine
description: A mining landscape and processing site (gold and tin) at modern As Muradellas in the Spanish municipality of Baltar (Ourense province) that may have had two periods of working, first during the early Roman empire and again in the 12th-13th centuries.

properties.description: Location determined in Google Earth after Meunier 2023, Figure 1. Dates after Meunier 2023.
properties.title: Approximate Imagery Location of Center of Mining Area
